attributes.action: Nationwide ban on the use of all Neonicotinoid pesticides.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to top sanctioning it’s use.
Back in 2018, then the environment secretary, Michael Gove said “The weight of evidence now shows the risks neonicotinoids pose to our environment, particularly to the bees and other pollinators.
The Uk Expert Committee on Pesticides said in 2017 “evidence exists that exposure to neonicotinoids can effect reproductive health of wild bees.
The European Food Safety Authority say they possibly impair the development of the human nervous system.
attributes.background: I want the Government to ban the use of all Neonicotinoid pesticides in the UK.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943
